channel.title: hugo on Veerendra's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Veerendra's Blog

item.title: Moving to Hugo and other updates!
item.description: It has been 2 year since I wrote a new post. Due to busy work and moving to a new city, new jobs and getting married, I wasn’t able to keep up posts. Finally I’m back now, I have been thinking of changing blog themes for a long time. I spent some time on Jekyll themes and tried to modify them according to my requirements. As you can see here my feature branch.
